paragraphs.body: In 2003, Harris married actress Peter Pamela Rose.
paragraphs.text: In 2003, Harris married actress Peter Pamela Rose.

paragraphs.body: Harris was the host of the short-lived Double Dare 2000 on ${link_0} and was also a host of Nickelodeon's Big Help on the Road in the late 1990s. In 2002, Harris voiced Bill Dickey in the failed Adult Swim pilot Welcome to Eltingville. He also did several minor voices in the video game Destroy All Humans! 2. He has recently appeared on Codename: Kids Next Door and in a commercial for Olive Garden.
paragraphs.text: Harris was the host of the short-lived Double Dare 2000 on Nickelodeon and was also a host of Nickelodeon's Big Help on the Road in the late 1990s. In 2002, Harris voiced Bill Dickey in the failed Adult Swim pilot Welcome to Eltingville. He also did several minor voices in the video game Destroy All Humans! 2. He has recently appeared on Codename: Kids Next Door and in a commercial for Olive Garden.
